data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Mechelen at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Mechelen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anderlecht's Jeremy Doku is on target but unsuccessful.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a throw-in for Mechelen, close to Anderlecht's area.
In the minute 3, Throw-in high up the field for Mechelen in Mechelen.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Anderlecht in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Mechelen are coming forward and Nikola Storm gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Anderlecht goal kick.
Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Alexandre Boucaut awards the home team a throw-in.
Anderlecht awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of Mechelen.
In the minute 9, Can Anderlecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mechelen's half?
Throw-in Anderlecht.
Mechelen's Nikola Storm breaks free at AFAS Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Anderlecht at AFAS Stadion.
In Mechelen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 14, Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Mechelen in their own half.
Mechelen have been awarded a corner by Alexandre Boucaut.
Mechelen push forward at AFAS Stadion and William Togui gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Anderlecht defence.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Mechelen close to the penalty box.
Anderlecht needs to be cautious. Mechelen have an attacking throw-in.
Can Mechelen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Anderlecht's half?
In the minute 17, Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Michael Murillo for Anderlecht who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Michael Murillo for Anderlecht is back on the field again.
In the minute 21, Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Mechelen.
Mechelen to take a throw-in in Anderlecht territory.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a Anderlecht throw-in in Mechelen's half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of Mechelen.
Mechelen have a goal kick.
Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Can Anderlecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mechelen's half?
Free kick Anderlecht.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of Mechelen.
In the minute 29, Nany Dimata (Anderlecht) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
In the minute 30, Anderlecht drive upfield and Jeremy Doku gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mechelen defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mechelen.
Mechelen's Joachim Van Damme has been booked in Mechelen.
In Mechelen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Alexandre Boucaut.
Michael Murillo (Anderlecht) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 34, Alexandre Boucaut awards Mechelen a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Mechelen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Mechelen in their own half.
Goal kick for Anderlecht at AFAS Stadion.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Attention is being given to Anderlecht’s Jeremy Doku and play has been suspended briefly.
Jeremy Doku returns to the field for Anderlecht after picking up a slight injury.
Mechelen to take a throw-in in Anderlecht territory.
In the minute 42, Alexandre Boucaut awards Anderlecht a goal kick.
Free kick Anderlecht.
Issa Kabore (Mechelen) has received a yellow card from Alexandre Boucaut.
In the minute 42, The match at AFAS Stadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Francis Amuzu, who is down injured.
Francis Amuzu is back on the pitch.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Mechelen in their own half.
In the minute 44, Derrick Luckassen for Anderlecht has been booked by Alexandre Boucaut and receives a first yellow card.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Mechelen.
Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 45, At AFAS Stadion the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Mechelen Mechelen drive forward through Aster Vranckx. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Anderlecht have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Alexandre Boucaut.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a Anderlecht throw-in in Mechelen's half.
Throw-in for Anderlecht close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Mechelen in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at AFAS Stadion.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Mechelen to check on Jeremy Doku, who is grimacing with pain.
Anderlecht’s Jeremy Doku is on his feet again at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 50, Mechelen surge into the attack at AFAS Stadion but Rob Schoofs’s header is off-target.
Anderlecht have a goal kick.
Nikola Storm (Mechelen) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Anderlecht goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mechelen.
Anderlecht have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, In Mechelen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
William Togui of Mechelen gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Anderlecht at AFAS Stadion.
Michel Vlap (Anderlecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Alexandre Boucaut awards Anderlecht a goal kick.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 57, Geoffry Hairemans (Mechelen) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mechelen.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of Mechelen.
Ball safe as Mechelen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frank Vercauteren is making the team's first substitution at AFAS Stadion with Antoine Colassin replacing Nany Dimata.
In the minute 61, Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Mechelen.
Throw-in for Mechelen in the half of Anderlecht.
Antoine Colassin for Anderlecht gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Mechelen goal kick.
Throw-in for Anderlecht at AFAS Stadion.
Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 64, Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Anderlecht in their own half.
Jeremy Doku puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Michael Murillo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Anderlecht goal kick.
Goal kick for Anderlecht at AFAS Stadion.
Free kick Mechelen.
In the minute 69, Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of Mechelen.
At AFAS Stadion, Aster Vranckx has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 70, Alexandre Boucaut waits before resuming play because Peter Zulj for Anderlecht is still down.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a Anderlecht throw-in in Mechelen's half.
Peter Zulj has recovered and rejoins the match in Mechelen.
In the minute 72, Mechelen's William Togui gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mechelen.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 75, Michael Murillo puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a first substitution, with Igor De Camargo replacing Nikola Storm.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick Mechelen.
William Togui (Mechelen) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Anderlecht defenders.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of Mechelen.
Throw-in Mechelen.
Mechelen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Onur Kaya is replacing Geoffry Hairemans for the home team.
In the minute 81, Alexandre Boucaut awards the home team a throw-in.
In Mechelen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of Mechelen.
In the minute 83, Igor De Camargo keeps Mechelen’s hopes alive with a headed strike to make it 1-2.
Issa Kabore with an assist there.
In the minute 84, Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in their own half.
Jordi Vanlerberghe is replacing Aster Vranckx for Mechelen at AFAS Stadion.
Free kick for Mechelen in their own half.
In the minute 85, Goal! Jordi Vanlerberghe equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Great play from Issa Kabore to set up the goal.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a free kick to Mechelen.
In the minute 88, Free kick Mechelen.
Anderlecht's Antoine Colassin has been booked in Mechelen.
The away team have replaced Francis Amuzu with Yari Verschaeren. This is the second substitution made today by Frank Vercauteren.
Mechelen have been awarded a corner by Alexandre Boucaut.
In the minute 89, Edo Kayembe is on a sub for Killian Sardella for Anderlecht.
In Mechelen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Anderlecht drive forward but Antoine Colassin is judged offside.
Alexandre Boucaut signals a throw-in for Mechelen, close to Anderlecht's area.
Anderlecht have a goal kick.
Can Anderlecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mechelen's half?
Anderlecht drives forward and Michel Vlap gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Alexandre Boucaut.
Alexandre Boucaut awards Mechelen a goal kick.
In Mechelen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
